sub_topic: Identifying the maximum independent set in a graph.
message_1:
Consider the following graph G:

[Insert a diagram of a graph with nodes and edges]

What is the maximum independent set in G? Provide the nodes in the independent set.
message_2: As an AI language model, I cannot see or interpret images or diagrams. Please provide a textual description of the graph, including the nodes and edges, and I will help you find the maximum independent set.
